title: ion-checkbox
body: Checkboxes allow the selection of multiple options from a set of options. They appear as checked (ticked) when activated. Clicking on a checkbox will toggle the
property. They can also be checked programmatically by setting the

props.name: color
props.docs: The color to use from your application's color palette. Default options are: "primary", "secondary", "tertiary", "success", "warning", "danger", "light", "medium", and "dark". For more information on colors, see theming.

props.name: disabled
props.docs: If true, the user cannot interact with the checkbox.

props.name: indeterminate
props.docs: If true, the checkbox will visually appear as indeterminate.

props.name: mode
props.docs: The mode determines which platform styles to use.

props.name: name
props.docs: The name of the control, which is submitted with the form data.

props.name: value
props.docs:
The value of the toggle does not mean if it's checked or not, use the checked property for that.

The value of a toggle is analogous to the value of a <input type="checkbox">, it's only used when the toggle participates in a native <form>.

docs: Checkboxes allow the selection of multiple options from a set of options. They appear as checked (ticked) when activated. Clicking on a checkbox will toggle the `checked` property. They can also be checked programmatically by setting the `checked` property.

docsTags.text: {"ios" | "md"} mode - The mode determines which platform styles to use.
docsTags.name: virtualProp

docsTags.text: container - The container for the checkbox mark.
docsTags.name: part

docsTags.text: mark - The checkmark used to indicate the checked state.
docsTags.name: part

events.docs: Emitted when the toggle loses focus.
Emitted when the checked property has changed.
Emitted when the toggle has focus.

styles.name: --background-checked
styles.docs: Background of the checkbox icon when checked

styles.name: --border-color
styles.docs: Border color of the checkbox icon

styles.name: --border-color-checked
styles.docs: Border color of the checkbox icon when checked

styles.name: --border-radius
styles.docs: Border radius of the checkbox icon

styles.name: --border-style
styles.docs: Border style of the checkbox icon

styles.name: --border-width
styles.docs: Border width of the checkbox icon

styles.name: --checkmark-color
styles.docs: Color of the checkbox checkmark when checked

styles.name: --checkmark-width
styles.docs: Stroke width of the checkbox checkmark
